name: Air Squat
description: A bodyweight squat targeting the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Barbell Hack Squat
description: A barbell squat variation that focuses on the quadriceps and glutes.

name: Barbell Lunge
description: A barbell exercise emphasizing quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes during lunging.

name: Barbell Walking Lunge
description: Targets the quadriceps and glutes with added core stabilization in a walking motion.

name: Belt Squat
description: A squat variation using a belt to reduce spinal load while targeting quadriceps.

name: Bodyweight Lunge
description: A simple lunge targeting quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes using body weight.

name: Box Squat
description: A squat to a box that focuses on quadriceps and glutes while improving form.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: A single-leg squat variation that isolates the quadriceps and glutes.

name: Chair Squat
description: A beginner-friendly squat variation using a chair to focus on quadriceps and glutes.

name: Dumbbell Lunge
description: A weighted lunge targeting quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes using dumbbells.

name: Squat (Dumbbell)
description: A squat variation with dumbbells focusing on quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Front Squat
description: A barbell squat with the weight on the front of the body, primarily targeting quadriceps.

name: Goblet Squat
description: A squat variation holding a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level, targeting quadriceps and glutes.

name: Hack Squat Machine
description: A machine-based squat exercise focusing on the quadriceps while minimizing upper body involvement.

name: Half Air Squat
description: A reduced range squat targeting quadriceps with less knee stress.

name: Landmine Hack Squat
description: A landmine squat variation emphasizing quadriceps development.

name: Landmine Squat
description: A squat using a landmine setup, focusing on quadriceps and glutes.

name: Leg Extension
description: An isolation exercise for strengthening the quadriceps using a leg extension machine.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Pause Squat
description: A squat variation with a pause at the bottom to increase time under tension on quadriceps.

name: Safety Bar Squat
description: A squat using a safety bar to reduce shoulder strain while focusing on quadriceps.

name: Shallow Body Weight Lunge
description: A less intense lunge variation focusing on quadriceps without full depth.

name: Side Lunges (Bodyweight)
description: A lateral lunge targeting the quadriceps, inner thighs, and glutes.

name: Smith Machine Squat
description: Targets the quadriceps with added stability from the Smith machine, allowing for controlled movements.

name: Squat (Barbell)
description: A foundational squat variation that engages the quads, glutes, and core with barbell resistance.

name: Step Up
description: Works the quadriceps and glutes by stepping onto an elevated platform, enhancing lower body strength.

name: Sissy Squat (Weighted)
description: Targets the quadriceps intensely while using weighted resistance for added challenge.

name: Pendulum Squat
description: A machine-based exercise focusing on the quads, utilizing a pendulum motion to isolate the muscle group.

name: Squat (Bodyweight)
description: A fundamental bodyweight movement engaging the quadriceps and glutes for overall lower body strength.

name: Sumo Squat (Dumbbell)
description: This squat variation widens the stance to target the quads and inner thighs with dumbbell resistance.

name: Sumo Squat (Barbell)
description: Involves a wide stance to engage the quads, hamstrings, and inner thighs with barbell weight.

name: Sumo Squat (Kettle Bell)
description: Targets the quads and inner thighs by holding a kettlebell while squatting in a wide stance.

name: Zecher Squat
description: A barbell squat variation where the bar is held in the elbows, focusing on quads and core stability.

name: Squat (Smith Machine)
description: Utilizes the Smith machine to provide extra control and focus on the quads during squats.

name: Step Up (Dumbbell)
description: Targets the quads and glutes by stepping onto an elevated surface while holding dumbbells.

name: Step Up (Barbell)
description: Engages the quads and glutes by stepping up while carrying a barbell for resistance.

name: Side Step Up
description: Focuses on the quadriceps and outer thigh by stepping up laterally onto an elevated platform.
